name: Can't Brake (TriJam#193)
description:
TriJam#193 - "Patience"

You have a problem.

The brakes of your car are gone. Dead. Nothing happens when pushing the pedal. But you can accelerate! Yeah! Speeeeed! Well... at least until the next crossing or a red traffic light... But yeah. Speed!

Anyway... You must try to make it to the garage, where your brakes can be repaired.

Watch the traffic lights and

BE PATIENT

before you make a move!

This is a simple pattern-analyzing game made for TriJam in 3 hours in a team of two with my favorite designer elKortes!

Developer: Grisgram aka Haerion Coldrock

Visuals: elKortes
